replies.txt_content: 目前連機還沒有動物MOD的樣子...?

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-8-25 06:36 编辑 

Mo'Creatures 官網有提到... 
Q.: Does this work for SMP?
A.: Using itemcraft, you can play this mod for multiplayer

就是之前跟你提過的那個...

replies.author: shenid
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-8-25 06:34 
Mo'Creatures 官網有提到... 
Q.: Does this work for SMP?
A.: Using itemcraft, you can play this mod ...
Itemcraft的确能让服务器上支持安装动物MOD。我装好以后，客户端却上不去。即使安装了MODLoader和MODLoader MP、16bit和相关MOD一样不行，进去就黑屏，之后服务端提示掉线：End of stream（数据流断开），悲剧啊。坐等高手。
